append.xpath: //item[ not (@name='meleeToolAxeT1IronFireaxe') and not (@name='meleeToolAxeT3Chainsaw') and ((starts-with(@name,'meleeToolAxe')) or (starts-with(@name,'ulmMeleeBlade')) or (starts-with(@name,'ulmMeleeClub')) or (starts-with(@name,'ulmGunKinetic')) or (@name='ulmToolPickaxeStone')) ]/property[@name='Tags']/@value
